full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RINGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA ME LHA MCHOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RINGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHED 'GROG AI MCHI BKA' BCU BA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS BZHIN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS BSOGS YUL 'DI GAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANGS PA'I BKRA SHIS PA 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN RLABS SOGS YIG TSIG LHAN CANG GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MONG, RANG DE LA LHA BSKYED DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS CHEN MO'I GA-YUNG GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUG RNAMS RAB 'BYAMS PAR NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA SBEL TSIG DANG BCAS PA LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG 'BUL SOGS NI NOM CHI KO'U SHRI RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI SUG BRIS SO, ,)
